trans-unit.source: Displays the basic facts about the TYPO3 application, version and licensing terms.
trans-unit.target: Viser grundlæggende fakta omkring TYPO3 systemet, versionsnummer og licensbetingelser.

trans-unit.source: TYPO3 CMS - Professional Web Content Management System
trans-unit.target: TYPO3 Professionelt Web Content Management System

trans-unit.source:
TYPO3 CMS is an enterprise-class, Open Source Content Management System, used internationally to build and manage websites of all types, from small sites for non-profits to multilingual enterprise solutions for large corporations.

For further information visit typo3.org.

TYPO3 CMS is freely available under the TYPO3-license (GNU/GPL).

You are using %s %s
trans-unit.target:
TYPO3 CMS er et Open Source Content Management System i enterprise klassen, der bruges internationalt til at bygge og administrere alle typer websites, fra små hjemmesider for non-profits til enterprise løsninger i flere sprog for store firmaer.

For yderligere information, besøg typo3.org.

TYPO3 CMS er frit tilgængelig under TYPO3-license (GNU/GPL).

Du bruger version %s %s

trans-unit.source:

For further information visit typo3.org.

TYPO3 CMS is freely available under the TYPO3-license (GNU/GPL).

trans-unit.source: Visit typo3.org/community/ if you want to know why TYPO3 rocks.
trans-unit.target: Besøg typo3.org/community/ hvis du vil vide hvorfor TYPO3 er så godt.

trans-unit.source:
Visit typo3.org/teams-committees/core-development/ for the complete member list.

The Git Repository and the ChangeLog can be found here.
trans-unit.target:
Besøg typo3.org/teams-committees/core-development/ for en komplet medlemsliste.

GIT Repository og ChangeLoggen kan findes her.

trans-unit.source: This is a list of the people who contributed to the extensions you're using in your installation.
trans-unit.target: Dette er en liste over de personer der har deltaget i udvikling af de udvidelser du bruger i denne installation.

trans-unit.source:
It would be great if you could donate. TYPO3 CMS is Open Source and relies heavily on donations from its users and supporters.

Thank you for making this great Content Management System even better with your support!
trans-unit.target:
Det ville være flot hvis du kunne donere. TYPO3 CMS er Open Source og baserer sig i stor grad på donationer fra dets brugere og støtter.

Tak

ved at gøre dette Content Management System endnu bedre med din støtte!

trans-unit.source: TYPO3 CMS core uses and thanks these external Open Source projects:
trans-unit.target: TYPO3 CMS kerne bruger og takker disse eksterne Open Source projekter:
